content: वेदनं, वेदना [विद्-ल्युट्] {@--1@} Knowledge, perception. {@--2@} Feeling, sensation. {@--3@} Pain, torment, agony, anguish; अवेदनाज्ञं कुलिशक्षतानां <ls>Ku. 1. 20</ls>, <ls>R. 8. 50.</ls> {@--4@} Acquisition, wealth, property. {@--5@} Marriage; <ls>Ms. 3. 44</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">9. 65</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 62.</ls> {@--6@} Presenting, giving. {@--7@} The marriage of a Śūdra woman with a man of a higher caste.
